TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2,T3,T4> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`4<T1, T2, T3, T4> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3, T4) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable
type Tuple<'T1, 'T2, 'T3, 'T4> = class interface IStructuralEquatable interface IStructuralComparable interface IComparable

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: 此元组的第一个组件的类型。

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: 此元组的第二个组件的类型。

typeparam.span: 此元组的第四个组件的类型。

summary.span: 表示 4 元组，即四元组。

span.span: Represents a 4-tuple, or quadruple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示4元组, 或四元组, 它是具有四个组件的元组。The class represents a 4-tuple, or quadruple, which is a tuple that has four components. 可以通过调用构造函数或静态方法来实例化对象。You can instantiate a object by calling either the constructor or the static method. 您可以使用只读、 、 和实例属性检索元组组件的值。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , , and instance properties. 元组通常以四种不同的方式使用:Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 表示单个数据集。To represent a single set of data. 例如, 元组可以表示数据库记录, 并且其组件可以表示记录的各个字段。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 提供对数据集的轻松访问和操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下面的示例定义了一个对象数组, 这些对象包含棒球 pitchers 的名称、其发出的节的数量, 以及所获得的运行 (未使用 "错误" 的评分) 以及它们所放弃的命中数。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of baseball pitchers, the number of innings they pitched, and the number of earned runs (runs that scored without fielding errors), and hits that they gave up. 该数组将传递给`ComputeStatistics`方法, 该方法计算每个罐状指针的获得的平均运行平均值 (在 inning 的游戏中给出的平均运行数) 以及每个 inning 指定的平均命中次数。The array is passed to the `ComputeStatistics` method, which calculates each pitcher's earned run average (the average number of runs given up in a nine-inning game), and the average number of hits given up per inning. 方法还使用这两个平均值来计算假设的有效性平均值。The method also uses these two averages to compute a hypothetical effectiveness average. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 从方法返回多个值, 而不使用`out`参数 (在中C#) 或`ByRef`参数 (在 Visual Basic 中)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如, 上一个示例在对象数组中返回其计算统计信息, 以及指针的名称。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the name of the pitcher, in an array of objects. - 若要通过单个参数向方法传递多个值, 则为。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如, 该方法只有一个参数, 该参数使你可以为启动时线程执行的方法提供一个值。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果提供对象作为方法参数, 则可以提供具有四个数据项的线程启动例程。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread's startup routine with four items of data.

Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在`obj`下列条件下, 参数被视为等于当前实例:The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是一个对象。It is a object. - 它的四个组件的类型与当前实例相同。Its four components are of the same types as the current instance. - 它的四个组件等于当前实例的组件。Its four components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认对象相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个对象数组, 这些对象在一天中的三次提供温度数据。The following example defines an array of objects that provide data on temperatures at three times during a particular day. 调用方法以将每个对象与每个其他对象进行比较。 The method is called to compare every object with every other object. 该输出说明了方法仅在`true` 对象的所有四个组件都具有相等值时才返回。The output illustrates that the method returns `true` only when all four components of the objects have equal values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型:You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过对属性`GetType`返回的值调用方法。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象, 并从该数组中检索由其方法返回的第一个元素。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个对象的数组, 这些对象的组件包含城市名称、一年中的月份以及该月的平均高温和低温度。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain the name of a city, a month of the year, and the average high and low temperatures for that month. 然后检索并显示每个组件的值。It then retrieves and displays the value of each component. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下两种方式之一动态确定组件的类型:You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过对属性`GetType`返回的值调用方法。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象, 并从其方法返回的数组中检索第二个元素。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the second element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个对象的数组, 这些对象的组件包含城市名称、一年中的月份以及该月的平均高温和低温度。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain the name of a city, a month of the year, and the average high and low temperatures for that month. 然后检索并显示每个组件的值。It then retrieves and displays the value of each component. MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供用于比较的自定义规则的对象。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.
Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance precedes .
Zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。

span.span: This instance and have the same position in the sort order.
A positive integer
This instance follows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 尽管可以直接调用此方法, 但它最常见的方法是包含参数的集合排序方法, 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如, 它由方法和使用构造函数实例化的对象的方法调用。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等, 则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等, 请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个对象数组, 其中包含有关棒球 pitchers 的统计数据。The following example creates an array of objects that contain statistical data about baseball pitchers. 数据项包括罐状指针的名称、节的数量、罐状指针的获得的平均运行平均值 (每个游戏的罐状指针允许的平均运行数) 以及罐状指针的命中次数。The data items include the name of the pitcher, the number of innings pitched, the pitcher's earned run average (the average number of runs a pitcher allows per game), and the number of hits the pitcher has given up. 该示例以未排序的顺序显示数组中每个元组的组件, 对数组进行排序, 然后调用以按排序顺序显示每个元组的值。The example displays the component of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display the value of each tuple in sorted order. 为了对数组进行排序, 此示例定义了`PitcherComparer`一个泛型类, 该类实现接口, 并按其第三个组件 (获得的运行平均值) 的值以升序对对象进行排序, 而不是先组件.To sort the array, the example defines a generic `PitcherComparer` class that implements the interface and sorts the objects in ascending order by the value of their third component (the earned run average) rather than their first component. 请注意, 该示例不会直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 此方法由方法为数组中的每个元素隐式调用。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals(object other, class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer) cil managed
Function Equals (other As Object, comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Boolean Implements IStructuralEquatable.Equals

param.name: other
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，该对象定义用于评估两个对象是否相等的方法。

span.span: An object that defines the method to use to evaluate whether the two objects are equal.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值根据指定的比较方法指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object based on a specified comparison method.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. C# 仅当`other`不为`null`时, 才会调用实现,并且如果它可以成功地强制转换(在中)或转换(在VisualBasic)到其组件类型与当前实例相同的对象。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法首先 传递要与实现进行比较的对象的值。 The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回`true`, 将再次调用方法并传递两个对象的值。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 如果此方法调用再次`true`返回, 则将第三次调用方法并传递两个对象的值。If this method call returns `true` again, the method is called a third time and passed the values of the two objects. 如果此方法调用再次`true`返回, 则为第四个和最后一次调用方法并传递两个对象的值。If this method call returns `true` again, the method is called for the fourth and final time and passed the values of the two objects. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个`Item3And4Comparer` 实现接口的类, 并更改计算对象的相等性的方式。The following example defines an `Item3And4Comparer` class that implements the interface and changes the way in which objects are evaluated for equality. 当向传递两`true`个 `obj.Equals`对象的和属性值时, 此方法始终返回, 并调用方法来计算其属性值。 The method always returns `true` when it is passed the and property values of two objects, and it calls the `obj.Equals` method to evaluate their property values. 此方法调用返回 true, 它还调用`obj.Equals`方法来计算元组的属性值。It this method call returns true, it also calls the `obj.Equals` method to evaluate the tuples' property values. 因此, 方法仅根据和属性的值测试相等性。As a result, the method tests for equality based only on the values of the and properties. 输出说明了一组对象的结果, 这些对象记录美国城市的名称、月份的月份以及该月的平均高温和低温度。The output illustrates the result for a data set of objects that record the name of a U.S. city, the month of a year, and the average high and low temperature for that month. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode(class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer) cil managed
Function GetHashCode (comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，其 方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: An object whose method calculates the hash code of the current object.

summary.span: 使用指定的计算方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: Calculates the hash code for the current object by using a specified computation method.

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只是包装对`comparer` 对象实现的调用。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应为被视为相等的两个对象返回相同的哈希代码。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.IComparable.CompareTo(object obj) cil managed
Function CompareTo (obj As Object) As Integer Implements IComparable.CompareTo

param.name: obj
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

summary.span: 比较当前 对象与指定对象，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置：是在指定对象之前、之后还是在与指定对象相同的位置。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供 类的实现。This method provides the implementation for the class. 尽管可以直接调用方法, 但它通常由集合排序方法 (如和) 的默认重载调用, 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等, 则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等, 请调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法使用默认的对象比较器来比较每个组件。The method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个对象数组 , 这些对象的组件由棒球罐的名称、节的数目以及所给出的命中数和所获得的得分组成。The following example creates an array of objects whose components consist of a baseball pitcher's name, number of innings pitched, and number of hits and earned runs given up. 它以未排序的顺序显示数组中每个元组的组件, 对数组进行排序, 然后调用以按排序顺序显示每个元组。It displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display each tuple in sorted order. 输出显示数组已按名称排序, 这是第一个组件。The output shows that the array has been sorted by name, which is the first component. 请注意, 该示例不会直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 此方法由方法为数组中的每个元素隐式调用。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.compareto/cs/compareto1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.compareto/vb/compareto1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的字符串采用格式 (*Item1*、 *Item2*、 *Item3*、 *tuple.item4*), 其中*Item1*、 *Item2* 、 *Item3*和*tuple.item4*表示的值。分别是、 和属性。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, *Item4*), where *Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*, and *Item4* represent the values of the , , , and properties, respectively. 如果任何属性值为`null`, 则将其表示为。 If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example illustrates the method. 它显示4元组对象数组的组件, 这些对象包含城市名称、月份月份以及该月的最高和最低温度。It displays the components of an array of 4-tuple objects that contain the name of a city, a month of the year, and the high and low average temperature for that month. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`4.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.tostring/cs/tostring1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`4.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`4.tostring/vb/tostring1.vb#1)]
